content.body: Firefox only implements https://tc39.es/ecma402/#sec-lookupmatchinglocalebyprefix . I hear from sffc that Chrome doesn't implement it and only delegates to ICU4C's lookup as https://tc39.es/ecma402/#sec-lookupmatchinglocalebybestfit . What does Safari do for lookup?
